column5: Happy Canada Day to all of WC's Canadian citizens. May you celebrate safely with family, friends and fishing. PjShorthorn
Thanks PJ.......I will drink some Canadian beverages in honour of this day.......
Happy Birthday to all our friends in the Great North.
Go easy on those special CO-OP beverages. See you and Susanne in a few weeks. PjShorthorn.
Shags, Andrea, Mike Borger Todd and Carrie at Cedar Island Lodge and all Canadians hope you had a great day!
